text: In aka haɗa da ’ya’yan nan maza46.27 Da Ibraniyanci; Seftuwajin, yara tara guda biyu waɗanda aka haifa wa Yusuf a Masar, membobin iyalin Yaƙub, waɗanda suka tafi Masar, duka su saba’in46.27 Da Ibraniyanci (dubi kuma Fit 1.5 da kuma fassara ƙasar shafi); Seftuwajin (dubi kuma Ayy M 7.14) saba’in da biyar. ne.
